text: Opens 24 hrs. You can buy sim card specially you are ships crew and need sim card. This place is for you.

Not sure how this was rated 4.1. Went on a monday afternoon. It was deserted. There were 3 customers including myself. Most of the shops were shut. I did manage to get fresh buns and a drink. Only 1 other indian stall was open but the food did not look very appetising and I noticed some flies over the open food. Cheap enough but really not worth the walk from the MRT on a sweltering day.
Environment might not be the best but the Economic rice/ Mix veg rice aunty and uncles were very accommodating and nice. Their food were amazing too! various selections of dishes and soup

The Nasi Briyani Ayam here is one of the best I‚Äôve tried in Singapore. The rice has a very authentic nice taste. Choose the curry chicken, or fish. Fried chicken is too hard and dry. üê•
